Package com.soprabanking.ips.controllers

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.HomeController
@CrossOrigin
@RestController
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
Home Controller Provides Rest-APIs for user registration and login.

This is a Home Controller Class which implements registration handler(registration rest-API), handler for fetching all teams from database(getTeam rest-API) and login handler (login rest-API)

Author:
kavsharma

    • findAllTeams

      @GetMapping("/getTeam") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> findAllTeams()
      This method returns list of the team which are already exist in our database.
      Returns:
      a list of team names.

    • registerUser

      @PostMapping("/userRegister") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> registerUser​(@RequestBody ModelWrap modelWrap)
      This method returns the response message which shows whether the user has successfully registered or not.
      Parameters:
      modelWrap - the modelwrap has both user object and team object.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP Status .

    • basicauth

      @GetMapping(path="/signIn") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationBean> basicauth​(java.security.Principal principal)
      This method returns all details of user when the user logins into the system and shows that details on the landing page.
      Parameters:
      principal - the principal has the object of that user who logins into the system.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP Status .
